title: Introducing: Transits
body: **Transits** (Sydney’s Cameron Taylor) is set to become the latest name in a rapidly growing list of emerging Australian electronic artists. His six track debut EP features three collaborations, which prove to be the highlights of the release, from the beautifully airy, Hype Machine ready _Under_ (with Catherine Grace) to the more upbeat _Over and Over_ (with Cat Cork), it’s a mightily exciting release. Check out a couple of personal favourite below, alongside the full EP. Under by Transits feat. Catherine Grace Under by Transits feat. Kiersten Nyman Under by transits
